attr.pathogenesis: intense abdominal pain from various underlying causes

attr.implementation: core vaccinations starting at 6-8 weeks of age
attr.expected effect: protection against diseases that can lead to acute abdomen

attr.implementation: hygiene, sanitation, limiting access to toxins, proper diet
attr.expected effect: reduce risk of exposure to pathogens
